resources.string: Passcodes did not match. Try again.
All your local data will be deleted and you will be logged out in %1d seconds
Unable to set up MEGA Camera Uploads folder
This process is taking longer than expected. Please wait.
Your password unlocks your Recovery Key

Your data is only readable through a chain of decryption operations that begins with your master encryption key, which we store encrypted with your password. This means that if you lose your password, your Recovery Key can no longer be decrypted, and you can no longer decrypt your data.
Exporting the Recovery Key and keeping it in a secure location enables you to set a new password without data loss.
An external attacker cannot gain access to your account with just your key. A password reset requires both the key and access to your email.
Copy the Recovery Key to the clipboard or save it as text file.
The Recovery Key has been successfully copied
If you have a backup of your Recovery Key, you can reset your password by selecting YES. No data will be lost.

You can still export your Recovery Key now if you have an active MEGA session in another browser on this or any other computer. If you don’t, you can no longer decrypt your existing account, but you can start a new one under the same email address by selecting NO.
Do you have a backup of your Recovery Key?
Please enter your email address below. You will receive a recovery link that will allow you to submit your Recovery Key and reset your password.
This is the last step to delete your account. You will permanently lose all the data stored in the cloud. Please enter your password below.
Please check your email to proceed.
An error occurred, please try again.
You must be logged in to perform this action.
You need to be logged in to complete your email change. Please log in again with your current email address and then tap on your confirmation link again.
Congratulations, your new email address for this MEGA account is: %1$s
Please check the email address and try again.
Please enter your Recovery Key below
Due to our end-to-end encryption paradigm, you will not be able to access your data without either your password or a backup of your Recovery Key.

You can park your existing account and start a fresh one under the same email address. Your data will be retained for at least 60 days. In case that you recall your parked account’s password, please contact support@mega.nz
Please enter your email address below. You will receive a recovery link that will allow you to park your account.

This is the last step to park your account, please enter your new password. Your data will be retained for at least 60 days. If you recall your parked account’s password, please contact support@mega.nz
This recovery link has expired, please try again.
Your Recovery Key will be used to reset your password. Please enter your new password.
You will receive a recovery link that will allow you to reset your password.
Grow your cloud.[A]Get increased storage and transfer quotas with a Pro account.

The MEGA account Recovery Key has been saved to: %1s. [A]You can find the file with your Recovery Key in the Saved for Offline section.[/A] Note: as the file with your Recovery Key will be deleted when you log out, please store it in a safe place outside your MEGA account.
This email address is already in use. Please use another email address.
You have already requested a confirmation link for that email address.
This is your existing email address.
This is the last step to change your email. Please enter your password below.

resources.string: An error has occurred. The chat history has not been successfully cleared
Protects your chat with end-to-end (user controlled) encryption, providing essential safety assurances:
The system ensures that the data received is truly from the specified sender, and its content has not been manipulated during transit.
Only the author and intended recipients are able to decipher and read the content.

You are strictly prohibited from using the MEGA Cloud service to infringe copyrights. You may not upload, download, store, share, display, stream, distribute, email, link to, transmit or otherwise make available any files, data or content that infringes any copyright or other proprietary rights of any person or entity.

Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account.
Why do you need two-factor authentication?

Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the six digit code only you have access to.
Scan or copy the seed to your Authenticator App.
Be sure to back up this seed to a safe place in case you lose your device.

Next time you log in to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your Authenticator App.
Please save your Recovery Key in a safe location, to avoid issues in case you lose access to your app, or if you want to disable two-factor authentication.

You need an authenticator app to enable 2FA on MEGA. You can download and install the Google Authenticator, Duo Mobile, Authy or Microsoft Authenticator app for your phone or tablet.

It is possible that you are using the same password for your MEGA account as for other services, and that at least one of these other services has suffered a data breach.
Your password leaked and is now being used by bad actors to log into your accounts, including, but not limited to, your MEGA account.
An error occurred while trying to add the nickname
You do not have the correct permissions to amend this file. Would you like to create a new file?
Version was created as a new file successfully.
Are you sure you want to stop sharing these %1$d folders?
Your transfers have been interrupted. Upgrade your account or wait %s to continue.
The file cannot be found in your Cloud Drive.

plurals.name: over_disk_quota_paywall_text
plurals.item: We have contacted you by email to %1$s on %2$s, but you still have %3$s files taking up %4$s in your MEGA account, which requires you to have %5$s.
We have contacted you by email to %1$s on %2$s and %3$s, but you still have %4$s files taking up %5$s in your MEGA account, which requires you to have %6$s.

resources.string: We have contacted you by email to %1$s, but you still have %2$s files taking up %3$s in your MEGA account, which requires you to have %4$s.
[B]You have [M]%s[/M] left to upgrade[/B]. After that, your data is subject to deletion.
[B]You have to upgrade[/B]. Your data is currently subject to deletion.
[B]You must act immediately to save your data.[/B]
This is best done in real life by meeting face to face. If you have another already-verified channel such as verified OTR or PGP, you may also use that.
Updating credentials. Please try again later.
Your phone number has been removed successfully.
Failed to remove your phone number.
The account you’re trying to reset is blocked.
Your account has been blocked. Please contact support@mega.nz
Your account has been deactivated by your administrator. Please contact your business account administrator for further details.
Your account has been removed by your administrator. Please contact your business account administrator for further details.
This operation will remove your current phone number and start the process of associating a new phone number with your account.
This will remove your associated phone number from your account. If you later choose to add a phone number you will be required to verify it.
No available GIFs. Please try again later
Unpause transfers to proceed with your upload.
Debugging info for chat messages enabled
Debugging info for chat messages disabled
You have reached the maximum limit of %d reactions.
This message has reached the maximum limit of %d reactions.
[A]%1$s[/A][B] changed the message clearing time to [/B][A]%2$s[/A][B].[/B]
Delete all messages and files shared in this conversation. This action is irreversible.
Automatically delete messages older than a certain amount of time.
Are you sure you want to clear the full message history of this conversation?
Unable to change priority of the transfer “%1$s”
Export link and decryption key separately.
MEGA Pro users have exclusive access to additional link safety features making your account even more secure.

Our end-to-end encryption system requires a unique key automatically generated for this file or folder. A link with this key is created by default, but you can export the decryption key separately for an added layer of security.
Share the key for this link?
Share the password for this link?
MEGA needs your permission to access your files for sharing.

We use Cookies and similar technologies (’Cookies’) to provide and enhance your experience with our services. Accept our use of Cookies from the beginning of your visit or customise Cookies in Cookie Settings. Read more in our [A]Cookie Policy[/A].
Cookie Settings changes have been saved
Essential for providing you important functionality and secure access to our services. For this reason, they do not require consent.

Help us to understand how you use our services and provide us data that we can use to make improvements. Not accepting these Cookies will mean we will have less data available to us to help design improvements.
%s is not in your contact list
Discard changes and close the editor?
File creation failed. Please try again.
File not saved to %1$s. Try again.
File update failed. Please try again.
File is too large and can’t be opened or previewed.
To proceed you need to type a file extension
You might not be able to open this file if you change its extension.
There is already a file with the same name
There is already an item with the same name
Automatically back up your photos and videos to your Cloud Drive.
Share owner is over storage quota.
The file cannot be sent as the target user is over their storage quota.

resources.string: Do you remember your password?\nMEGA cannot reset your password if you forget it.
MEGA needs write permissions to your device storage to continue.
Options such as “Send decryption key separately”, “Set expiry date” or “Set password protection” are only available for single items.
You are the only one here
Before leaving, please assign one or more new moderators for the meeting.
Please assign one or more new moderators.
You are invited to a meeting.
Tap the Meeting link sent to you or paste it here
MEGA needs access to your microphone and camera for meetings.
Go to Settings to allow MEGA to access your camera and microphone.
Invite more participants to the meeting. Swipe up to invite.
Tap to create a new meeting
Quickly set up a MEGA meeting with our new encrypted meeting feature
Please enter a valid meeting link
Join the largest secure cloud storage and collaboration platform in the world.
Sign up now and enjoy advanced collaboration features for free.
Another call in progress. Please end your current call before making another.
Logging out deletes your offline content.
Hide recent activity in Home section.
Change settings to choose which screen opens when you next launch the MEGA app.
You can save space by decreasing the video quality in Camera Uploads settings.
MEGA does not support image insertion here

Our file versioning feature ensures that we keep older copies of your files around if you replace them with newer versions. If you disable File Versioning you will no longer have this protection; the old copy will be lost when you replace it.
Invite sent successfully. See sent requests.
Please enter a valid file or folder link
Please enter a valid chat link
You have pasted a chat link.
You have pasted a contact link.
Use mobile data to preview high resolution images
Allow the use of mobile data to load high resolution images when previewing. If disabled, the original image will only be loaded when you zoom in.
You are changing a default backup folder location. This may affect your ability to find your backup folder in the future. Please remember where it is located so that you can find it in the future.

Moving this folder changes the destination of one or more configured backups and may have unintended consequences. The backups will be turned off for your safety. Backups can be re-enabled with the MEGA Desktop App. Do you want to proceed?
You are deleting your backups folder. This will remove all the backups you have set. Are you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you want to delete your backup folder and disable the associated backup?
Move backup folders to Rubbish Bin
Please type “%1s” to confirm this action
To ensure these items added to your backup folder are automatically synchronised to the MEGA Cloud, please set them up in the MEGA Desktop App.
This folder can only be shared as read-only; as this is a backup folder, any changes to its content could disable the backup.

Items in this folder are part of a configured backup and are synchronised to a local folder. Taking this action will break the synchronisation and disable the backup. The backup can be re-enabled in the MEGA Desktop App. Are you sure you want to proceed?
These folders can only be shared as read-only; as they are backup folders, any changes to their content could disable the backups.
Some folders shared are backup folders and read-only. Do you wish to continue?
MEGA uploads your images from the gallery. To change the upload location please go to Camera Upload settings.
You already have a subscription. If you buy another one you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription through %1$s. Visit our Help Centre for more information.

You already have a subscription. If you buy another one you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription from your iTunes account. Visit our Help Centre for more information.

You already have a subscription. If you buy another one, you will be charged twice. To avoid this, cancel your current subscription by going to MEGA in a desktop or mobile web browser. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
Go to Settings to grant MEGA permission to access your nearby devices using Bluetooth.
We are unable to proceed with the billing. If you are using a dual app, please consider logging in to MEGA without it. If not, try to upgrade through your web browser.
You have an active MEGA subscription with %1$s. You must cancel it separately at %2$s, as MEGA is not able to cancel it for you. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
You have an active MEGA subscription. It will be canceled automatically after the account is deleted. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
You have an active MEGA subscription with Apple. You must cancel it separately from your iTunes account, as MEGA is not able to cancel it for you. Visit our Help Centre for more information.
This is the last step to delete your account. Both your account and subscription will be deleted and you will permanently lose all the data stored in the cloud. Please enter your password below.
File format is not supported. Cannot open the file.
The selected folder is empty. No files to upload.
You have entered your current password
